Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ConnectionHelper
    Listens for new connections, creates controller objects and redirects active connections to them
    Controller
    MVC Controller component
    GameMode
    The type Game mode.
    MultiPlayer
    The type Multi player.
    ServerClosingThread
    Runnable class to quit the server when received a specific input
    SinglePlayer
    The type Single player.
    TransactionController
    Controller for an orderly flow of a Transaction
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    TurnState
    Associates a controller action to the state of the player's turn (this class is symmetrical to model\TurnState)
